name: Smith Dccoy
description: I have been described by others as loving, caring, honest and trustworthy. I’m interested in meeting friend to spend time with and to travel with. I’m up for being friends or more if the chemistry is there. Either way, I prefer there to be no pressure and lets just have a fun time getting to know each other. I’m typically outgoing and fun to be around. Work keeps me busy during the week….but I like to spend my weekends getting away. I’m not into moody, depressed or drama filled people. There is just to much in life to be thankful for. I prefer those who are bold enough to speak the truth…even when it hurts them. Its something I admire and value in a friendship or relationship. I’m big on current events and enjoy spending time with someone who is up to date on what is going on in the world. I usually read the news every morning . I’m a huge reader and can spend hours at the bookstore! Am also looking for someone that is very honest, good communication skills in there relationships, faithful, romantic, good personality, loves to smile and have fun.
